Adobe CS3, App-V 4.5 and 0xc0150002

Dec 7, 2008 Aaron Parker

If you are deploying any of the Adobe CS3 application (such as Photoshop, Illustrator or InDesign) suite in App-V 4.5, this knowledgebase article may come in handy: When launching applications from the Adobe CS3 suite using Application Virtualization 4.5 clients, you may encounter an error: 0xc0150002

When you start applications from the Adobe CS3 suite, such as Illustrator, using Application Virtualization 4.5 clients, you may encounter the following error: The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0150002). Click on OK to terminate the application.
